articles.description: The 2022 Academy Award attendees have been left fearing they'll miss the ceremony as they nervously await the results of two mandatory PCR tests ahead of Sunday's ceremony.

The 2022 Academy Award attendees have been left fearing they'll miss the ceremony as they nervously await the results of two mandatory PCR tests ahead of Sundays ceremony.
